data.name: Amaya's Lost Soul
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to AMAYA’s LOST SOUL. In this 2d Action Game you play as Amaya the daughter of an all and mighty great “CREATOR”. The great “CREATOR” is leader of the Out Raiders a cult who are looking to expand so to speak. You are tasked with taking down a kingdom under the command of the “CREATOR”. Will you follow through and commit to your masters will or fight back. Choices Matter in this 2d pixel art action game.

Features:
*Fluid 2d Combat System
*Boss Battles
* Multiple Endings
* Secrets spread across the land
*Meet a colorful cast of characters along the way
*Original Art brimming with personality
*Created mostly by one person
*Choices Matter in this Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHZ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHZ or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / Nvidia Geforce GTX750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
